sen.j: 山岡元隣（やまおか げんりん、寛永8年（1631年） - 寛文12年6月27日 (旧暦)（1672年8月19日））は、江戸時代前期の俳人・仮名草子作者。
sen.e: Genrin YAMAOKA (1631 to August 19, 1672) was a haiku poet and an author of kana zoshi (novels written for women and children using kana rather than Chinese characters to make them understand easily) who lived during the early Edo period.

sen.j: 元隣は、京都の裕福な商人の家に生れたが体が弱く家業を廃して、漢学・医術を修学して生涯を町医者として送った。
sen.e: Though Genrin was born into the house of a rich merchant in Kyoto, his body was so weak that he abolished the family business, studied Sinology and the medicine, and devoted himself as a town doctor.
